answerText: NMR [or nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy][10] NMR makes use of this phenomenon in which a quantum system cycles between two states. Formally it involves revolution around the Bloch sphere, and it is named for another scientist who worked on NMR.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Editors 2 - FINAL | 1 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The nuclear Overhauser effect can be used to determine 3-D structure in this technique's two dimensional form. For 10 points each:  [10] Name this form of spectroscopy invented by Purcell and Bloch which has proton and carbon-13 types.
